name: Demon Hearts
description: Demon Hearts is a 2D platformer game that will leave you feeling blood thirsty for victory every time you play! Take the winged and dangerously swift Vampiress Snow through many challenging silhouette environments while withstanding the many divergent demons, evil forces, and bosses!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium (R) Dual-Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) 82945G Express Chipset Family Sound Card: HDAUDIO

reviews.review_text: Demon Hearts-- it's a fast paced precision platformer, that wears its inspirations on its sleeves, it takes all the best lesons learned from platformers of recent years and jam packs them into 50ish levels. The controls are simple and the gameplay is deep without being too complex.   There is no doubt that you should pick this hidden gem up, as it's only $10, especially if you're a fan of games like, Super Meat Boy, I wanna be the Guy, Wings of Vi, etc.

A 'hard platformer' as made by somebody who doesn't understand how to make a fun platformer hard, rather than just making sure there are a lot of tedius deaths and time limits that force you to rush thru plain and boring levels. I Wanna Be the Guy is still free and has far more character than this game.
